This rewritten text is more concise and easier to read. It prioritizes the most important information, such as the reference number, publication date, tender closing date, and contact information. Additionally, it rephrased the text to make it more coherent and grammatically correct. It also includes headings and links in English and French to make it more accessible to a wider audience.  Throughout this rewording, all key elements of the original message remain intact without the straining meaning. 

**Steps to the rewritten document.**

1. Reformat and renounce the data into markdown format with headings and links.
2. Prioritize the importance of each piece of information and omit the less relevant data.
3. Rewrite each piece of text in a more professional and grammatically correct manner.
4. Make sure the translations are up to date and consistent.
